column4: it's for a app called "mpc" which controls mpd, a music playing daemon. The variable is called MPD_HOST
By default, mpc connects to localhost:6600. This can be changed either at compile-time, or by exporting the MPD_HOST and MPD_PORT environment variables.
Really, I need to do this on-the-fly, as I need to connect to both the local mpd server and a remote one
